mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.name, o.path, o.parent_id, o.location, o.category_id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name, o.sort, CASE WHEN LEAST( MAX(CASE p.code WHEN 'ADMIN' THEN 2 WHEN 'READ' THEN 1 WHEN 'DISABLE' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END), MAX(CASE tp.code WHEN 'ADMIN' THEN 2 WHEN 'READ' THEN 1 WHEN 'DISABLE' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END) ) >= 2 THEN 'ADMIN' WHEN LEAST( MAX(CASE p.code WHEN 'ADMIN' THEN 2 WHEN 'READ' THEN 1 WHEN 'DISABLE' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END), MAX(CASE tp.code WHEN 'ADMIN' THEN 2 WHEN 'READ' THEN 1 WHEN 'DISABLE' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END) ) >= 1 THEN 'READ' ELSE 'DISABLE' END AS permission_code FROM feature_objects o LEFT JOIN feature_object_categories c ON o.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN tenant_feature_permissions tfe ON tfe.object_id = o.id AND tfe.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND tfe.status = 1 INNER JOIN permissions tp ON tp.id = tfe.permission_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT rp.object_id, rp.permission_id FROM role_permissions rp INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id WHERE ur.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND rp.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ) rel ON rel.object_id = o.id INNER JOIN permissions p ON p.id = rel.permission_id WHERE o.type = 'MENU' AND o.status = 1 GROUP BY o.id, o.name, o.path, o.parent_id, o.location, o.category_id, c.name, o.sort ORDER BY o.sort ASC, o.id ASC
